title: Ep 94: Stop Freaking Out!
description: This week I discuss a freak out I had over my kid getting his first fever. How do we know when we are overreacting to a situation? And why are we attracted to people who aren't good for us? This episode explores these issues and why losing a pet is super devastating. Let's get extra deep on this, bros!!
author: nadav@ymhstudios.com (Christina Pazsitzky)
